channel.title: Lunar altar in delta MESSED UP NEED HELP ASAP
channel.description:
Hello moparians, i hope you'll read this and know the answer First of all i added lunar altar at my home with no errors when i compiled.. But when i click the altar to change the spellbook it freezes the client and it crashes ill show the error..
Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 18787 at client.method36<client.java:1585> at client.method102<client.java:7889> at client.method9<client.java:8772> at applet_sub1.run<applet_sub1.java:123> at client.run<client.java:4588> at java.lang.Thread.run<Unknown Source>
if this is the wrong section you have my apoligies ive never posted before.

item.description:

item.title: Lunar altar in delta MESSED UP NEED HELP ASAP
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Yes, sorry. It should be in RSInterface.java, but it is not in your client, you have to look for it in other clients. You should also resize the interfaceCache array to 20000

Read full topic

item.title: Lunar altar in delta MESSED UP NEED HELP ASAP
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

jonathan1234:

thx alot for the download and help i have one more question though… what do you mean by interface code i probley sound stupid but what is that and what do i do with it

You don’t sound stupid, don’t worry :P. You have to find the interface code, it would possibly be something like this:

public static void lunarInterface(RSDrawingArea[] rda) { //code }

I do not know what client you are using, so I do not want to give you a method which will give you errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Lunar altar in delta MESSED UP NEED HELP ASAP
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Here is the download for the sprites:

http://up.ht/KrPMCO

Add it to your cache/interfaces

Now all you have to do is find the interface code from another similar client.

The client does not contain the interface that is being requested, and is over the array size. You have to add the lunar spellbook interface in RSInterface.java.
